alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:17AM CDT until August 07 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Tipton County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 817 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dixonville, or near Millington, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka, Barretville, Griffin Corner, Quito, Woodstock, Redwood, Rosemark, Idaville, Locke, Sloanville, Brunswick and Wilkinsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
